Articles.Content:
The Inter Continental Kerbin Space Research Laboratories Company Was recently formed by the uber-genius ArduinoNerd, known for owning electronics giant Kerbosoft. The engineers have already created the first generation of rockets, and they are very excited to start exploring the area beyond.

First off, I am not using any mods. Everything is completely unmodded and vanilla.

Missions:

Mission 1 - Unmanned LKO and Re-entry; Purpose - Gather information about atmosphere, make sure it is safe for manned missions; Outcome - In Progress

Edited June 24, 2013 by Arduinonerd

Lets introduce the rockets, I will add more as I make them.

We have the Fat line, including FatBoy and Fauto. FatBoy being manned and Fauto being unmanned.

I lost the save, so for now this thread will be discontinued
